title: Task 1: Describe visual elements of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describe one visual characteristic of the city of Machu Picchu.
Response does accurately describe one visual characteristic of the city of Machu Picchu.

title: Task 2: Describe contextual elements of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describe the physical context of the city of Machu Picchu.
Response does accurately describe the physical context of the city of Machu Picchu.

title: Task 3: Explain how context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately explain how the design of the city of Machu Picchu relates to its physical context.
Response does accurately explain how the design of the city of Machu Picchu relates to its physical context.

title: Task 4: Explain how context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately explain how the design of the city of Machu Picchu relates to its cultural context.
Response does accurately explain how the design of the city of Machu Picchu relates to its cultural context.

title: Task 5: Explain how an art historically valid interpretation of a work of art is derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific evidence to explain how the city of Machu Picchu can be interpreted as expressing central ideas of Inka culture.
Response does accurately use specific contextual evidence to explain how the city of Machu Picchu can be interpreted as expressing central ideas of Inka culture.
